actions.name: DeleteLexicon
actions.description: Grants permissions to delete the specified pronunciation lexicon stored in an AWS Region

actions.name: DescribeVoices
actions.description: Grants permissions to describe the list of voices that are available for use when requesting speech synthesis

actions.name: GetLexicon
actions.description: Grants permissions to retrieve the content of the specified pronunciation lexicon stored in an AWS Region

actions.name: GetSpeechSynthesisTask
actions.description: Grants permissions to get information about specific speech synthesis task

actions.name: ListLexicons
actions.description: Grants permisions to list the pronunciation lexicons stored in an AWS Region

actions.name: ListSpeechSynthesisTasks
actions.description: Grants permissions to list requested speech synthesis tasks

actions.name: PutLexicon
actions.description: Grants permissions to store a pronunciation lexicon in an AWS Region

actions.name: StartSpeechSynthesisTask
actions.description: Grants permissions to synthesize long inputs to the provided S3 location
